Spell preps and customizations / Hair-do unlocks

11
BriarFox
Monday, October 9th, 2017, 4:19:19 PM

All now available for immediate purchase in Chivalrous's shop in Icemule (;go 3547).

Crisp bright white page - 500k (4) Invoking this bright white page will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: Clipped and uniform, you formally call upon your patron for [Spell Name] and complete your summons with precise, martial gestures. Third Person: Clipped and uniform, Nuadjha formally calls upon his patron for aid and completes his summons with precise, martial gestures. Hidden or Invisible: Clipped and uniform, the formal call upon a patron rises in the air. Spell Circle Restrictions: Paladin Base

Translucent sheaf of parchment - 500k (1) - PENDING SALE Invoking this sheaf of parchment will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: Gesturing simply in the air, you invoke the wind to be your ally, and then cast [Spell Name]... Third Person: Gesturing simply in the air, Nuadjha invokes the wind to be his ally, and then casts... Hidden or Invisible: Rising softly on the air is the gentle sound of someone invoking the wind to be their ally. Specific Spell Restriction: 602

off-white parchment - 500k SOLD Hidden or Invisible: From somewhere nearby, you hear the lilting sound of a chanty being sung. Profession Restrictions: Bard only Specific Spell Restriction: 1004

thin sheet of music - 1m SOLD Invoking this sheet of music will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: Calling to mind a lively jig, you hum a folk tune about fickle Lady Luck. You playfully launch into song and as the comical words to the chorus fall from your lips, you seamlessly weave them into [Spell Name]. Third Person: Nuadjha hums a traditional folk song about fickle Lady Luck. He leaves behind the humming and playfully launches into the comical chorus. Hidden or Invisible: From somewhere nearby, you hear someone humming a traditional folk song about Lady Luck, which they finish by outright singing the comical chorus. Profession Restrictions: Bard only Specific Spell Restriction: 1006

hoarfrost-rimed slip - 1m (1) First Person: Reciting the mystical phrases of [Spell Name], you feel a rime of frost wreathe your tawny eyes and infuse them with an icy blue energy that dissipates as you release your spell. Third Person: Reciting the mystical phrases of his elemental spell, a rime of frost suddenly encircles Nuadjha's tawny eyes and infuses the whites of his ocular cavity with icy blue energy that dissipates as he releases his spell. Hidden or Invisible: Mystical phrases fill the air. Spell Circle Restrictions: Major Elemental

indigo-edged silver vellum - 500k (1) Invoking this silver vellum will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: You carefully weave the [Spell Name] spell into the air, trails of indigo and silver mist following the somatic components. Twisting and twining, the skeins of energy leech power from you and, as you unleash the spell, you feel droplets of moisture dripping from your fingertips... Third Person: Nuadjha carefully weaves his spell into the air, trails of indigo and silver mist following the somatic components. Twisting and twining, the skeins of energy slip away from him, leaving moisture to drop from his fingertips... Hidden or Invisible: From somewhere nearby, the soft whisperings of a spell can be heard.

Antique yellow paper - 500k (3) Invoking this antique yellow paper will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: Hooding your eyes, you softly intone the mystical phrases of [Spell Name] and feel cold air chill your lips. Third Person: Hooding his eyes, Nuadjha softly intones the mystical phrases of his spell and his lips begin to blue. Hidden or Invisible: Cold air fills the area as someone nearby softly intones the mystical phrases of a spell. Specific Spell Restriction: 409

waxy indigo-veined vellum - 500k (4) First Person: Placing the fingers of your left hand upon the back of your right, you slowly trace out a pattern on your weathered golden brown skin and watch as an ethereal light illuminates your veins. Slowly, methodically, you intone the familiar words of [Spell Name] and watch as the patterns dance like eels beneath waves before discharging into a fine mist in the air. Third Person: Placing the fingers of his left hand upon the back of his right, Nuadjha slowly traces out a pattern on his weathered golden brown skin and an ethereal light begins to illuminate his veins. Slowly, methodically, Nuadjha intones a soft prayer and the patterns, which now dance like eels beneath waves, suddenly burst from his flesh in a fine mist. Hidden or Invisible: As a slow, methodical prayer finishes from somewhere nearby a fine, indigo mist fills the air. Spell Circle Restrictions: Cleric Base

odd-hued waxed parchment - 1m (2) Invoking this waxed parchment will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: Invoking [Spell Name], you feel a slight tugging sensation behind your crystal green eyes. Third Person: Invoking elemental powers, Arkios's crystal green eyes flash with an arcane light. Hidden or Invisible: Specific Spell Restriction: 416

mottled thick parchment - 1m (2) Invoking this thick parchment will grant you permanent access to a special method of preparing your spells. It will provide the following phrase:

First Person: Reaching outward, you call upon the spirits of chaos to come to your aid and to empower your [Spell Name] spell. Third Person: Nuadjha calls upon the spirits of chaos to come to his aid and to empower his spell. Hidden or Invisible: From somewhere nearby, a wild call for aid to the spirits of chaos echoes through the area. Specific Spell Restriction: 216

greasy prayerbook page - 500k First Person: Groveling and wheedling, you murmur a cajoling prayer, focusing on [Spell Name]... Third Person: Groveling and wheedling, Nuadjha murmurs a cajoling prayer, focusing on [Spell Name]... Hidden or Invisible: Groveling and wheelding, the murmuring sound of a cajoling prayer fills the air. Spell Circle Restrictions: Cleric Base

Tiny elk antler trinket - 2m (2) The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant a custom Major Sanct. (220): The Hunter's Retreat Warm and inviting, a cozy fire burns within a fireplace that is capped with a bird's eye maple mantle. Knotty pine walls and floors encase the room, the latter of which is decorated with hunting trophies and mounted horns. Thick bear and wooly mammoth pelts spread across the ground and provide plush comfort for visitors and denizens alike. The soft howl of wind trickles in from outside, but the sturdy walls and warm fire keep the chill at bay."

petrified hermit bar - 1m The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "This hermit bar will grant you the ability to summon: a chewy dark brown hermit bar (manna bread). You must have knowledge of this spell to use it."

a clam-shaped disk - 500k (2) This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant a custom Animated Disk (511) of: a clam-shaped (player's name) disk. At this time, redemption of this customization will permanently disable default messaging of this spell. Please remember you must be able to cast this spell on your own in order to use the customization and that this clam-shaped disk does not grant you the spell."

seaweed-covered disk - 1m SOLD The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant a custom Animated Disk (511) of: a seaweed-covered (player's name) disk. At this time, redemption of this customization will permanently disable default messaging of this spell. Please remember you must be able to cast this spell on your own in order to use the customization and that this seaweed-covered disk does not grant you the spell."

The effect of this token is cosmetic. It does not increase the effect or damage caused by a spell. This item does NOT grant spell knowledge. REDEEMing this item assumes that the player already has the ability to cast the customized spell either from an item, Spell Knowledge, or having the spell cast upon you, if applicable.

blue monkey's paw trinket - 500k This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant you the ability to cast a customized Major Sanctuary(220) of: The Deluged Bluefin Encased in a bubble of air, the room appears to be the waterlogged remains of a restaurant's bar. Water drips from the once polished fixtures, while seaweed clings to a marble floor that is similar in color to the oily fronds. Though no seats remain around the bar, which is crafted of an aquarium that long ago lost all of its denizens, a silver-edged green glass door still bears its bluefin design.

vathor club limb - 500k (4) The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant a custom Tangleweed (610) of vathor club limb. At this time, redemption of this customization will permanently disable default messaging of this spell. Please remember you must be able to cast this spell on your own in order to use the customization and that this vathor club limb does not grant you the spell."

fossilized emerald iguana arm - 1m The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant a custom Grasp of the Grave (709) of emerald iguana arm. At this time, redemption of this customization will permanently disable default messaging of this spell. Please remember you must be able to cast this spell on your own in order to use the customization and that this emerald iguana arm does not grant you the spell."

piece of dark species - 1m The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant the ability to cast a customized Well of Life (308) of: a brief, suffocating presence settles upon your shoulders. You must have knowedge of this spell to use it. At this time, redemption of this customization will PERMANENTLY disable default messaging of this spell."

piece of sandy species - 1m The creator has also provided the following information: This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant the ability to cast a customized Well of Life (308) of: the grit of sand and dried saltwater briefly touches your skin. You must have knowedge of this spell to use it. At this time, redemption of this customization will PERMANENTLY disable default messaging of this spell."

icy snowflake-filled jar - 250k (3) This is a prize token that, once REDEEMed, will "Grant a custom Blink (1215) of icy snowflakes. At this time, redemption of this customization will permanently disable default messaging of this spell. Please remember you must be able to cast this spell on your own in order to use the customization and that this filled jar does not grant you the spell."

a black glaesine ball incised with golden runes - 1.5m You analyze your glaesine ball and sense that the creator has provided the following information: This ball, if redeemed, will provide custom bolt messaging for the Balefire (713) spell as such: You shoot a diaphanous orb of sickly green energy at a giant rat! Nuadjha shoots a diaphanous orb of sickly green energy at a giant rat!
